abstract: In Tel Aviv, an Israeli man defaced a memorial to Yitzhak Rabin, on the spot where the former Israeli prime minister was assassinated in 1995 by a right-wing extremist who opposed his efforts to make peace with the Palestinians.
snippet: In Tel Aviv, an Israeli man defaced a memorial to Yitzhak Rabin, on the spot where the former Israeli prime minister was assassinated in 1995 by a right-wing extremist who opposed his efforts to make peace with the Palestinians.

headline.main: Angered by Shalit Deal, Israeli Defaces Rabin Memorial
